text: Udonis Haslem and Dwyane Wade shared a moment last night while looking up at their jerseys in the rafters‚ù§Ô∏è What a moment for the Heat legends üôå (via @MiamiHEAT) pic.twitter.com/Puu1KauNIK Clutch Points: Rumor Hype Rumor visits per day for the last week Views per day January 20, 2024 | 11:02 am EST Update Blazers sign Taze Moore to 10-day contract Adrian Wojnarowski: The Portland Trail Blazers are signing G Taze Moore of the G League‚Äôs Rip City Remix on a 10-day contract,sources tell ESPN. Moore played his college basketball for Kelvin Sampson at Houston. Jorge Sierra: Kevin Durant passed Hassan Whiteside in blocks and Dominique Wilkins in rebounds last night. Just so you know. Michael Scotto: Cam Thomas: ‚ÄúI feel like the goal post always moves for me. When people now score all these points, it‚Äôs all praise. But when I used to do it, it‚Äôs always a knock.He can‚Äôt play defense. He doesn‚Äôt pass. But when I see other people doing the same thing, it‚Äôs praise.‚Äù pic.twitter.com/FqwnMJF9El Former NBA star DeMarcus Cousins‚Äô double-double debut saw the Taiwan Beer Leopards secure a 119-90 blowout win against the Tainan TSG GhostHawks on Saturday. The Leopards improved to 9-4 after the game, tying the New Taipei CTBC DEA atop the five-team T1 LEAGUE on the back of a franchise-record five-game winning streak. The 6,015 spectators who turned up for Cousin‚Äôs debut also set a new attendance record for the Leopards at the Taoyuan Arena, the franchise‚Äôs home since last summer. Cousins logged 13 points, 10 rebounds, five assists, two steals, and one block in 28:24 on the floor ‚Äî a performance the four-time NBA All-Star suggested he could exceed with adequate rest. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm jet-lagged; I just got off a 14-hour flight. I‚Äôll get some recovery after this game, get my legs fresh, and be ready for tomorrow. So hopefully, it‚Äôs a better performance,‚Äù the 33-year-old center said after the game. Udonis Haslem spent 20 seasons wearing a Miami Heat jersey. Now, his jersey will forever hang from the rafters in the Heat‚Äôs home arena. During a halftime ceremony in the middle of Friday night‚Äôs game between the Heat and Atlanta Hawks at Kaseya Center, Haslem‚Äôs No. 40 jersey was retired by the organization. Haslem, 43, became the sixth Heat player to have his jersey retired, joining Alonzo Mourning, Tim Hardaway, Shaquille O‚ÄôNeal, Chris Bosh and Dwyane Wade. ‚ÄúLook at the list of the guys I‚Äôm sitting with,‚Äù Haslem said, referring to the first five Heat players who had their jerseys retired and are already in the Basketball Hall of Fame. ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs what‚Äôs huge to me.That‚Äôs what makes me feel so amazing is the core group of guys that I‚Äôm sitting with. Pat Riley ain‚Äôt just putting anybody up there. The Arisons ain‚Äôt just OK‚Äôing anybody to go up in those rafters.‚Äù Haslem, who was born at Miami‚Äôs North Shore Medical Center and grew up in Liberty City before playing at Miami High, then dedicated a part of his speech to his hometown of Miami ‚Äî the area code 305. ‚ÄúLiberty City, Overtown, Little Havana, Little Haiti, everybody, tonight when this jersey goes up in the rafters, all of y‚Äôall coming with me,‚Äù Haslem said during the speech.‚ÄúThe love y‚Äôall show me in this city, I love you guys, I appreciate you guys. ‚Ä¶. 305, you got to hold it up. You got to hold up the 305. Tonight, we all celebrate, 305.‚Äù Even though Haslem‚Äôs playing career is over and his Heat jersey is now retired, he‚Äôll remain around the organization.The Heat hired him as the vice president of basketball development in November and he still hopes to become part of the Heat‚Äôs ownership group one day. ‚ÄúTo be able to get out, make it, excel and succeed, I hope it‚Äôs a great example for other kids in Miami, in Liberty City and for my kids, as well,‚Äù Haslem said. ‚Äú‚Ä¶ This is a dream come true.‚Äù January 20, 2024 | 10:28 am EST Update Wizards sign Trey Jemison Shams Charania: The Washington Wizards plan to sign center Trey Jemison to a 10-day contract out of the NBA G League‚Äôs Birmingham Squadronsources tell @TheAthletic @Stadium. Jemison has averaged 13.6 points and 12.3 rebounds in G League this season. Justin Kubatko: Nikola Jokic last night: ‚úÖ 34 PTS ‚úÖ 12 REB ‚úÖ 9 AST ‚úÖ 14-22 FG Jokic has scored 263 points over his last 11 games, shooting 74.8% from the field, 57.1% from 3-point range, and 85.4% from the free throw line üò≥More in this morning‚Äôs free game notes: statitudes.com/p/nba-game-not‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/SqCo4UHFhX Justin Kubatko: Joel Embiid last night: ‚úÖ 36 PTS ‚úÖ 7 REB ‚úÖ 4 STL ‚úÖ 12-22 FG ‚úÖ 11-11 FT It‚Äôs the 19th straight 30-point game for Embiid, breaking a tie with Elgin Baylor for the sixth-longest such streak in NBA history. More in today‚Äôs free game notes: statitudes.com/p/nba-game-not‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/azlhwcJE3h Justin Kubatko: Devin Booker was üî• last night: ‚úÖ 52 PTS ‚úÖ 18-30 FG ‚úÖ 6-11 3P ‚úÖ 10-10 FT
